resources.string: 1.- First we need to look to your Summoner account. \n\nPlease, provide us your summoner name, and your region. After click on "NEXT"

2.- We need to be shure that you are looking for your own acount.

Here you have a code, copy that code, and create a rune page, the page name should be the code.

Once you save your rune page, please click "NEXT"
Welcome to SYNERGY LOL, now you can get total access to the app with this account.
Are you sure you want to delete this summoner from the app?
You already have this summoner registered
Apparently RIOT said: your summoner doesn\'t exist, RITO please
you don\'t have any rune page with the code
